main event: Two civilian witnesses observed a bright white light coming towards them in Bartlett, New Hampshire on February 26, 1966.
interesting points: The object appeared as a round steady light with a dark center and a halo around it., The disturbed dog was noted to be agitated during the sighting., The object reportedly disappeared and reappeared several times., The witnesses described the object as being smaller than the moon but bright like a yard light., The object's presence was unsettling for the witnesses, who claimed they had never seen anything like it before.
sighted object: bright white light in the sky
witness description: civilian witnesses, highly articulate about their observation
